item.title: About Scott Locke
item.description: Scott W Locke System Engineer, DevOps, PowerShell Developer Tech Experience Windows Server Operating Systems from Windows NT 3.51 to Windows 2022 Active Directory Administration Security Remediation Automation using PowerShell Azure Active Directory CIS Compliance Declaritive Administration with DSC, Ansible, Puppet Infrastructure as Code with GIT
